title: Consequences of not attending 2 sem orientation?
content: I heard they took attendance in EC campus. What is the consequence if I don't attend.

comments.body: Explanation letter signed by your parents
Consequeses? They'll chop your head off mercilessly.
life imprisonment or, in extreme cases, even the death penalty
They’ll make you clean the Audi for whole sem and they won’t let you write the exams
Expect an orbital strike within 10 business days
